content: Yves Saint Laurent (YSL) is not currently an independent brand. In 1999, the fashion house was acquired by the luxury goods group Kering, formerly known as PPR. Kering is a multinational company based in France that owns a portfolio of luxury brands, including Alexander McQueen, Balenciaga, Brioni, Gucci, and Saint Laurent. YSL remains a distinct brand within the Kering portfolio and is known for its high-quality, stylish, and sophisticated fashion and beauty products.
